channel.title: Ports?
channel.description:
ok i know someones posted this before most likely but i have gone through the first like 20 pages of this and im tired of looking so i will ask real quick to make it quick.
what are the ports for rs private servers. please help

item.title: Ports?
item.dc:creator: @Omg_a_bk Omg a bk
item.description:
@Omg_a_bk wrote:

I THINK:

the ports are used to allow players in.

your firewall would normally not allow other computers in, but when you create your own server you blow open the port (5555 for example), so anyone using that port will have access to your server.

I think, Iâ€™m probly wrong though.
